tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ***** ***** * **** **** ******. Since 4 yrs i had dental problem and I had been visiting various doctors , the doctors sought out root canal as my solution and I have treated my 4 teeth with root canal but i had underwent pain even after root canal. only here i found out my wisdom teeth needed to be removed for my permanent pain loss. i am glad my brother suggested me to this doctor. so much kindness , attention and patience of the doctors here is admirable. their precise explanation of my issue and perfect treatment is something I am really thankful for. i had my 4 wisdom teeth removed within half an hour when I didn't feel  single pain and didn't know that my teeth were removed. there are plenty of doctors available but Dr. Sivaraman and Dr. Rajeshwari are those who work to relieve and cure problems . they are few of the gifted doctors one can have their treatment resolved with .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wouldn‚Äôt go to any other dentist. Dr Siva is the best. The way he explains the problem to the patient and the treatment he is going to perform. He takes time with each patient. Especially I have a gagging reflex and most dentists find it very difficult to work on my teeth. But Dr Siva handles it so beautifully and works with me to get my teeth to be ship shape. My whole family goes only to him. I have absolutely no hesitation to heartily recommend Dr Siva and Smile üòÉ with us to anyone and I assure you that you will be completely satisfied.

review:
I got my filling in March this year. It was a excellent job done by Dr G Siva Rama Krishna still today i have no issues. 

At the same time i got a filling done in 2019 by another doctor in which case the filling is unfilled and causing problems again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is too friendly and punctual. Visiting his clinic since 2005 and the doctor is too polite and treats with at most care. He prioritises our satisfaction in treatment. Smile with us clinic provides complete satisfaction for all our dental queries and issues. I am giving 5 stars for the service provided - Nalini Annadurai

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Smile with us. The captive name 100% suits the dental clinic, ''smile with us". Very hygienic and systematic clinic with well handling Doctors. These make every one to smile with the clinic, "smile with us". Entering the clinic with pain and leaving it   with smile is an awesome experience.
